Title: Casket with Harpies
Description: Seated figures are shown in central roundels on the sides and cover and in spandrels on front and back. Harpies appear in spandrels on the sides and the cover.
Provenance: Dikran Kelekian, New York and Paris [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Henry Walters, Baltimore, January 6, 1925, by purchase; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Mesopotamian
Images: PS1_54.525_3QtrRt_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.525_Back_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.525_Fnt_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.525_LftSide_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.525_RtSide_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.525_Top_DD_T09.jpg
